full_summary:
=====================================

**Repair and Maintenance Contract - Various File Bays**

### Contract Overview

Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking one or more contract(s) for the repair and maintenance of various File Bays in the File Management Centre located in Edmonton, Alberta. The File Bays are divided into four (4) streams: Montel, Spacesavers, SpacePro (Crank), and Spacefile (ACME).

### Objective

The successful contractor(s) will be responsible for performing annual preventative maintenance as well as on-demand repairs for the File Bays. The preventative maintenance will be performed once per fiscal year, from April 1 to March 31.

### Contract Period

The proposed contract period will commence on the contract award date and will conclude on March 31, 2024. The contract also includes three (3) additional one-year option periods.

### Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: 100022184-A
* Contracting Authority: Eric Potvin
* Email: nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca

### Requirements

* Annual (once per fiscal year) preventative maintenance
* On-demand repairs for the File Bays
* Maintenance of four (4) different types of File Bays: Montel, Spacesavers, SpacePro (Crank), and Spacefile (ACME)

### Tender Documents

The tender documents can be accessed through the Government of Canada website at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca). The relevant tender notice and associated documentation can be found at the following links:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6123/100022184a---rfp.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6123/100022184---rfp--1.pdf

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: June 29, 2023 at 14:30:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 3, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
